description:
We are thrilled to announce the September meetup which will be titled "Sustainability in DevOps + AI Twist - What's Next?"

We have two fantastic speakers lined up.

First up we have Sandro Cirulli, Senior Consultant at The Scale Factory. Sandro will be talking us through GreenOps and what is next coupled with how businesses can reduce their carbon footprint.

Our second speaker with be Graham Zabel, Head of DevOps at Devoteam. Graham will be doing a talk titled; "Sustainable Data: Unveiling DevOps and Data Practices to Save Both Cash and Carbon".

This will be held at the ForgeRock Offices, located in central Bristol and as always, kicking off at 6:30pm for food and drinks before talks commencing at 7pm.

Details:
📍 - 4th Floor, Broad Quay House, Prince St, Bristol BS1 4DJ
🗓️ 27th September
🕠 18:30 kick off
📢 Presentation Event
🍕🍺/🥤 Pizza and Beer/Soft drinks will be provided

To join the LinkedIn group, head to the link [here](https://www.linkedin.com/company/devops-cloud-native/)

Join the Slack channel to interact and chat with other community members! - https://join.slack.com/t/bristol-devops-and-cn/shared_invite/zt-21fewbk1h-1FLSn2FdAWZwFuhdJnHsPA
title: Sustainability in DevOps + AI Twist - What's Next?
